TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRunningObjectTable

summary.span: 提供 介面的 Managed 定義。

span.span: Provides the managed definition of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以藉由呼叫 COM 擷取介面，以執行物件表格[GetRunningObjectTable](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163472)函式。You can retrieve an interface to the running object table by calling the COM [GetRunningObjectTable](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163472) function. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < COM 的文件[IRunningObjectTable](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163473) MSDN library 中的介面。For more information, see the documentation for the COM [IRunningObjectTable](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163473) interface in the MSDN library. 當原生程式碼的 COM 方法會傳回 HRESULT，通用語言執行平台，則會擲回例外狀況。The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 對應 Hresult 和例外狀況](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

Public Sub EnumRunning (ByRef ppenumMoniker As IEnumMoniker)

abstract member EnumRunning : -> unit

param.name: ppenumMoniker
param.span: 這個方法傳回時，包含執行物件表格 (ROT) 的新列舉值。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the new enumerator for the Running Object Table (ROT).

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 列舉目前登錄為執行中的物件。

span.span: Enumerates the objects currently registered as running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件[IRunningObjectTable::EnumRunning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163475) MSDN library 中的方法。For more information, see the documentation for the [IRunningObjectTable::EnumRunning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163475) method in the MSDN library.

abstract member GetObject : System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IMoniker * -> int

param.name: pmkObjectName

span.span: A reference to the moniker to search for in the Running Object Table (ROT).

param.name: ppunkObject
param.span: 這個方法傳回時，包含要求的執行物件。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 如果提供的物件名稱已登錄為執行中，傳回這個已登錄物件。

span.span: Returns the registered object if the supplied object name is registered as running.

returns.span: 值，指出作業成功或失敗。

span.span: An value that indicates the success or failure of the operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Register (int grfFlags, object punkObject, System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IMoniker pmkObjectName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Register(int32 grfFlags, object punkObject, class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IMoniker pmkObjectName) cil managed
Public Function Register (grfFlags As Integer, punkObject As Object, pmkObjectName As IMoniker) As Integer
public: int Register(int grfFlags, System::Object ^ punkObject, System::Runtime::InteropServices::ComTypes::IMoniker ^ pmkObjectName);
abstract member Register : int * obj * System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IMoniker -> int

param.name: grfFlags
param.span: 指定執行物件表格 (ROT) 對 punkObject 的參考是弱式還是強式，並且透過它在 ROT 中的項目控制對物件的存取。

span.span: Specifies whether the Running Object Table's (ROT) reference to punkObject is weak or strong, and controls access to the object through its entry in the ROT.

param.name: punkObject
param.span: 登錄為執行中之物件的參考。

span.span: A reference to the object being registered as running.

param.name: pmkObjectName
param.span: 識別 punkObject 之 Moniker 的參考。

span.span: A reference to the moniker that identifies punkObject.

summary.span: 登錄所提供物件已進入執行狀態。

span.span: Registers that the supplied object has entered the running state.

returns.span: 值，在後續呼叫 或 時可用來識別這個 ROT 項目。

span.span: A value that can be used to identify this ROT entry in subsequent calls to or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ROT 的參考`punkObject`（弱式和強式） 會決定物件存留期。ROT references to `punkObject` (weak and strong) determine object lifetime. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < COM 的文件[IRunningObjectTable::Register](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163474) MSDN library 中的方法。For more information, see the documentation for the COM [IRunningObjectTable::Register](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163474) method in the MSDN library.
